name: OMC THERMOCHEMISTRY FKA OMC HYDROGEN
description: Veteran-owned developer of innovative hydrogen and chemical manufacturing processes.
sampleDescriptions: Advocating for financial support for the construction of a pilot-scale facility to thermochemically produce hydrogen and syngas (which can be converted to commodity chemical and fuel molecules).
